          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light travels in straight lines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in gerade Geraden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lumière voyage dans les lignes droites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em linhas retas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia nelle linee rette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια στις ευθείες γραμμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en líneas rectas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light travels in straight line.  Only the side of the earth facing the Sun is illuminated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">illumination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht in gerade 
Geraden reist. Nur die Seite der Masse, welche die Sonne 
gegenüberstellt, wird belichtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière voyage 
dans la ligne droite. Seulement le côté de la terre faisant 
face au soleil est illuminé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz viaja na linha 
reta. Somente o lado da terra que enfrenta o sol é iluminado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce viaggia 
nella linea retta. Soltanto il lato della terra che affronta il 
sole è illuminato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ελαφριά ταξίδια στην 
ευθεία γραμμή. Μόνο η πλευρά της γης που αντιμετωπίζει τον 
ήλιο είναι φωτισμένη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz viaja en 
línea recta. Solamente la cara de la tierra que hace frente al 
sol está iluminada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
